summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 10.3°C) and outside temperature (down 10.1°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 10%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 316 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles) and cloud levels (up 204 m) when compared to today.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 425m to a maximum of 1526m, averaging 636.7m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 841.0m and 841.1m respectively.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; prepare for cold, chilly weather ahead. Also, dry air conditions likely prevail and slight breezes. Drizzle or light rain possible, overcast skies with low cloud, and the light is absent. Weather patterns to stay the same.
